FAQs

How long does it take to setup?
All the VPS orders are verified manually, order verification process may take few hours after we receive the payment. Hence, the setup might take a few hours. Setup within 24hrs is guaranteed.

VPS Management?
We offer free VPS management service with our VPS hosting plans. Support for third party applications is not provided.

Additional IPs?
We provide additional IPs if proper justification is given.

Payment Options?
We accept payment through Paypal and Bank Transfer.
